name: chainbody
detailedPrompt:
Generate a floating 3D armor piece, precisely shaped for a scarecrow/T-pose body, with shoulder openings pointing straight sideways at a perfect 90-degree angle, forming a broad "T" shape when viewed from above. This armor has no extensions beyond the shoulders, contains hollow openings for body parts, and is not displayed on an armor stand.

Inspired by the classic Runescape 2007 style, this chainbody armor exhibits a highly detailed and textured pattern, emulating the intricate, interlocked metal rings characteristic to chainmail. It carries a slightly weathered, metallic sheen, providing an authentic, battle-worn aesthetic. The armor possesses a geometric form, the chest piece maintains a rectangular shape, with the shoulders tapering off into perfect half-circles.

Ensure stylistic consistency with the old-school Runescape art style, known for its simplicity, pixelated textures, and vibrant color palette. The armor's color should echo the game's traditional steel color - a blend of sil
